lead_paragraph: The ice hockey world championship may not have all the best players but with the National Hockey League non-committal about future Olympic participation the yearly tournament could be about to receive a boost in importance.

headline.print_headline: World Championship Could Benefit if NHL Snubs Olympics
headline.main: World Championship Could Benefit if NHL Snubs Olympics

snippet: The ice hockey world championship may not have all the best players but with the National Hockey League non-committal about future Olympic participation the yearly tournament could be about to receive a boost in importance....
